FDTD Geometry Writer Ver 1.0 Documentation¶

FDTDGeometryWriter is a supporting pre-processing library for the Open Source 3D Finite Difference Time Domain software maintained in collaboration between The University of Ottawa Computational Nanophotonics Lab The University of Ottawa Computational Nanophotonics Lab led by Dr. Lora Ramunno and Dr. Antonino Calà Lesina's research group at Leibniz Universität Hannover. The aim of this library is to provide a framework to map image files to the geometry.json system currently supported in this 3D-FDTD Software.

A Tutorial on what is going on in this library and Documentation on individual functions are included.

  • Usage
